scripts.build: npm i -y && sudo apt-get -y install gnupg curl && curl -fsSL https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-7.0.asc | sudo gpg -o /usr/share/keyrings/mongodb-server-7.0.gpg --dearmor && echo "deb [ arch=amd64,arm64 signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/mongodb-server-7.0.gpg ] https://repo.mongodb.org/apt/ubuntu jammy/mongodb-org/7.0 multiverse" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb-org-7.0.list && sudo apt-get -y update && sudo apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends mongodb-org && sudo systemctl start mongod && sudo chown -R mongodb:mongodb /var/lib/mongodb && sudo chown mongodb:mongodb /tmp/mongodb-27017.sock
